title: Chains with the largest share of the U.S. burger restaurant market as of June 2014
yAxis: Share of the burger restaurant market
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of the burger restaurant market for 4 number of Burger Restaurant Chainss.
The maximum Share of the burger restaurant market 34.3 is found at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and the minimum is found at Sonic Drive-Ins where Burger Restaurant Chains is 8.2.
There is a difference of 26.1 between the maximum Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and minimum Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Burger Restaurant Chains, and Share of the burger restaurant market in each Burger Restaurant Chains on the y axis.
The maximum Share of the burger restaurant market 34.3 is found at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and the minimum is found at Sonic Drive-Ins where Burger Restaurant Chains is 8.2.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of the burger restaurant market for 4 number of Burger Restaurant Chainss.
The maximum Share of the burger restaurant market 34.3 is found at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and the minimum is found at Sonic Drive-Ins where Burger Restaurant Chains is 8.2.
There is a difference of 26.1 between the maximum Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and minimum Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Burger Restaurant Chains, and Share of the burger restaurant market in each Burger Restaurant Chains on the y axis.
The maximum Share of the burger restaurant market 34.3 is found at Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's and the minimum is found at Sonic Drive-Ins where Burger Restaurant Chains is 8.2.
Second maximum Share of the burger restaurant market is found at Burger Restaurant Chains Burger King.
The highest Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's has 26.1 more Share of the burger restaurant market than the lowest Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins.

The Burger Restaurant Chains McDonald's has the highest Share of the burger restaurant market, followed by Burger King, and Wendy's. Down to the Burger Restaurant Chains Sonic Drive-Ins which is the lowest.
The highest value 34.3 at McDonald's is almost 1.91 times larger than the average value 17.95.
Summing up the values of all Burger Restaurant Chainss, we get total 71.8.
